reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 252/96: RATING BY-LAWS-EXTENSION OF TIME
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 252/96: RATING BY-LAWS-EXTENSION OF TIME
reg_info.act_under: Regional Municipalities Act   Loi sur les municipalités régionales

content.content: 1. For 1996, the time for the council of The Regional Municipality of Niagara to pass a regional rating by-law to raise the general regional levy under subsection 135.5 (3) of the Act is extended to June 30, 1996. O. Reg. 252/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For 1996, the time for the council of The Regional Municipality of Niagara to pass a regional rating by-law to raise the general regional levy under subsection 135.5 (3) of the Act is extended to June 30, 1996. O. Reg. 252/96, s. 1.
